title: Emma Goldman: A Documentary History of the American Years
text:
Emma Goldman: A Documentary History of the American Years is a book series of documents pertaining to anarchist Emma Goldman's time spent in the United States. Prepared by Candace Falk of the Emma Goldman Papers collection at the University of California, Berkeley, the documents cover Goldman's career from her 1890 arrival in the United States through her 1919 deportation to Russia.
